translations.source: e根据底部第一块砖的标高，全面检查。水平灰缝厚度大于20mm时，应采用细石混凝土找平。
translations.target: e Conduct a comprehensive inspection based on the elevation of the first bottom brick. If the thickness of the horizontal mortar joint exceeds 20 mm, level it with fine aggregate concrete.

translations.source: f要建造多孔砖墙，首先应在地面或地板上放置三层实心砖。此外，当多孔砖铺设到梁底时，最后一层应使用实心砖。
translations.target: f For hollow brick masonry walls, first lay three courses of solid bricks on the ground or floor slab. In addition, when the hollow bricks are laid up to the soffit of a beam, the top course shall be solid bricks.

translations.source: g在布置多孔砖时，上层和下层应交替接缝。搭接长度一般为多孔砖的1/4，但不小于60mm。不得使用角度损伤严重的多孔砖。
translations.target: g When laying hollow bricks, stagger the vertical joints between adjacent courses. The lap length is generally 1/4 of the brick length, but not less than 60 mm. Hollow bricks with severely damaged corners shall not be used.

translations.source: h水平灰缝控制在8-12mm左右，用砂浆填满，保证平直、平整。垂直接缝应用砂浆填充
translations.target: h Control the thickness of horizontal mortar joints at about 8–12 mm, fully filled with mortar to ensure straightness and flatness. Vertical joints shall be filled with mortar.

translations.source: i拉线砌筑时，应在测量前立即进行浇筑，采用挂线、靠尺的方法，保证墙体的垂直度。
translations.target: i When laying masonry with string lines, set the lines immediately before laying; use string lines and a straightedge to ensure the wall is plumb.

translations.source: 3)质量要求
translations.target: 3) Quality requirements

translations.source: a多孔砖的品种、规格、强度应符合设计要求。此外，还应提供出厂合格证和复验报告
translations.target: a The type, specifications, and strength grade of hollow bricks shall meet the design requirements. Factory certificates and re-test reports shall also be provided.

translations.source: b砂浆的品种必须满足设计要求，强度必须符合设计要求和检验评定标准。
translations.target: b The type of mortar shall meet the design requirements, and its strength shall comply with the design requirements and the inspection and acceptance criteria.

translations.source: c错缝墙砌体必须采用密实砂浆砌筑。接头必须是平直。
translations.target: c Staggered-joint masonry shall be built with dense (fully packed) mortar. Joints shall be straight.

translations.source: 5.1.7	抹灰工程
translations.target: 5.1.7 Plastering works

translations.source: a抹灰前，应仔细清除基层表面的灰尘、污垢和油污。
translations.target: a Before plastering, carefully remove dust, dirt, and oil stains from the substrate surface.

translations.source: b抹灰工程开工前，施工单位应办理结构验收手续。
translations.target: b Before commencing plastering works, the contractor shall complete the structural acceptance procedures.

translations.source: c应检查墙壁的平整度。坑太多应凿除或用1:3水泥砂浆找平；墙上的脚手架洞应该修补并浇水。
translations.target: c Check the flatness of the wall surface. Areas with excessive hollows shall be chiselled out or levelled with 1:3 cement mortar; scaffold holes in the wall shall be patched and moistened with water.

translations.source: d管道通过的墙或楼板孔洞应密封，不得渗水。
translations.target: d Openings in walls or floor slabs where pipelines pass through shall be sealed to prevent water leakage.

translations.source: e外墙的窗台、过梁、雨棚、压顶等，应在顶部做流水坡，在底部做滴水或滴水槽。食品柜的深度和宽度应大于10mm，排列整齐、平整。
translations.target: e For exterior wall sills, lintels, canopies, coping, etc., provide a drainage slope on the top and a drip edge or drip groove on the underside. The drip groove shall have a depth and width greater than 10 mm, and shall be formed neatly and evenly.

translations.source: f水泥砂浆和水泥混合砂浆的抹灰层应在前一层抹灰层设置好后进行。
translations.target: f Plastering with cement mortar or cement-lime mixed mortar shall be carried out only after the previous plaster layer has been properly applied and set.

translations.source: g室内墙面、柱面、门洞均应设置1:2水泥砂浆护角，护角高度不小于2m，每侧宽度不小于50mm。
translations.target: g Interior wall surfaces, columns, and door openings shall be provided with 1:2 cement mortar corner guards; the corner guard height shall be not less than 2 m, and the width on each side shall be not less than 50 mm.
5.1.8 Doors and windows

translations.source: a门窗应垂直堆放，垂直坡度不大于20度，有防雨措施。
translations.target: a Doors and windows shall be stored in an upright position, with the inclination not exceeding 20°, and protected against rain.

translations.source: b门窗安装前，应根据图纸要求和设计规定，检查门窗及所附五金件的型号、规格、数量是否正确
translations.target: b Before installation, check that the model, specifications, and quantities of doors/windows and their hardware accessories comply with the drawings and design requirements.

translations.source: c门窗必须水平和垂直安装，高度和深度一致。安装后，开口叶片闭合后，间隙不大于1mm。此外，车门开关灵活，无卡涩或回弹现象
translations.target: c Doors and windows shall be installed level and plumb, with consistent height and reveal depth. After installation, the gap after closing the sash/leaf shall be no greater than 1 mm. In addition, opening and closing shall be flexible, with no binding or rebound.

translations.source: d密封条安装后应留有膨胀余量。一般情况下，板条应比门窗装配侧长20-30mm。转弯处应断开倾斜面，并用粘合剂牢固粘合，以避免产生收缩缝。
translations.target: d After installation, sealing strips shall allow for expansion. In general, the strip length shall be 20–30 mm longer than the assembled side of the door/window. At corners, the beveled surfaces shall be cut and bonded firmly with adhesive to avoid shrinkage joints.

translations.source: e、门窗框安装固定采用锚铁支架。可以预埋尾部铁支架，也可以用锤钻钻10mm孔预埋连接膨胀螺栓。除不锈钢外，连接铁件、固定件等均应进行防腐处理。
translations.target: e Door/window frames shall be fixed with anchor iron brackets. Either tail-end brackets may be pre-embedded, or 10 mm holes may be drilled with a hammer drill to install expansion bolts for connection. Except for stainless steel, all connecting iron parts, fixings, etc. shall be treated for corrosion protection.

translations.source: 5.1.9	涂层施工
translations.target: 5.1.9 Coating works

translations.source: a清理墙、柱表面剥落、松散的材料，铲灰，擦拭墙、柱面。
translations.target: a Remove flaking and loose materials from wall and column surfaces, scrape off laitance, and wipe the wall and column surfaces clean.

translations.source: b第一遍满刮腻子打磨：室内大面积涂料表面填补缝隙后，用镶嵌工具满刮乳胶腻子。对所有微砂眼和收缩缝进行全面刮腻子，做到密实、平整、线角整齐。同时，涂层应沿墙横向连续刮涂，并尽可能薄，不得漏刮。接缝处不得留有杂物，注意不要污染门窗等表面
translations.target: b First full putty skim and sanding: After filling joints on large interior coating surfaces, use a trowel to apply a full skim of latex putty. Skim all pinholes and shrinkage cracks to achieve a dense, even surface with neat lines and corners. Meanwhile, apply continuously in the horizontal direction along the wall, as thin as possible, without missing areas. No debris shall remain at joints, and avoid contaminating surfaces such as doors and windows.

translations.source: c第二遍满刮腻子并打磨：第二遍全刮腻子的方法与第一遍相同，但刮腻子的方向应与第一遍相互垂直，即沿墙面垂直刮腻子，再进行满刮腻子，并打磨墙面，以保证平整、光滑。
translations.target: c Second full putty skim and sanding: The method is the same as the first coat, but the application direction shall be perpendicular to the first coat, i.e., skim vertically along the wall. Then sand the surface to ensure it is even and smooth.

translations.source: d第一道涂层：在第一道涂层之前，必须清洁基层表面，并擦拭浮尘。使用宽刷子进行涂层是合适的。涂刷顺序一般是从上到下、从左到右、从边线到转角、从小面到大面。内角不得有残留涂层，外角不得有包边。如果墙面不能一次从上到下涂刷，应协同向下涂刷多个层次，避免接缝与涂刷重叠。每次应在独立表面上涂覆同一批涂层。
translations.target: d First coat: Before the first coat, the substrate surface shall be cleaned and loose dust wiped off. A wide brush is suitable for application. The usual brushing sequence is top to bottom, left to right, from edges to corners, and from small areas to large areas. No coating residue shall remain at internal corners, and external corners shall not have wrapping/buildup. If the wall cannot be brushed from top to bottom in one pass, coordinate multiple tiers downward to avoid overlapping joints and brush marks. Each time, apply the same batch of coating on a single continuous surface.

translations.source: 5.2	钢结构
translations.target: 5.2 Steel structures

translations.source: 5.2.1	钢结构制作
translations.target: 5.2.1 Steel structure fabrication

translations.source: 钢结构由业主提供，运至施工现场指定位置，进场后需进行验收，检查构件几何尺寸、焊缝质量、防腐涂层等，验收合格后方可使用。
translations.target: The steel structures are provided by the Owner and transported to the designated location at the construction site. Upon arrival, they shall be inspected and accepted, including checks of member geometry, weld quality, anti-corrosion coating, etc. They may be used only after acceptance.

translations.source: 5.2.2	钢结构安装
translations.target: 5.2.2 Steel structure erection

translations.source: 1)基础复测
translations.target: 1) Foundation re-survey

translations.source: 基础资料一次性移交。控制点、控制线、控制基础的位置必须清晰、完整，交接资料必须符合要求。
translations.target: The foundation data shall be handed over in one time. Control points, control lines, and the positions of foundation controls shall be clear and complete, and the handover documents shall meet the requirements.

translations.source: 重新检查构件的几何尺寸和长度，将轴线和标高位置放置在适当的位置，并做出明显的标记，为安装施工做好准备。
translations.target: Recheck the geometric dimensions and lengths of members, set out the axis lines and elevation references at appropriate locations, and make clear markings to prepare for erection.

translations.source: 2)安装前的准备工作
translations.target: 2) Preparations before erection

translations.source: a钢结构出厂验收：根据设计文件，所有构件均按相关标准进行验收。
translations.target: a Factory acceptance of steel structures: In accordance with the design documents, all members shall be accepted per relevant standards.

translations.source: b总承包方和发包方代表应指定专人负责构件验收。
translations.target: b The general contractor and the Owner's representative shall designate dedicated personnel responsible for member acceptance.

translations.source: c每个部件都有合格的部件出厂证书
translations.target: c Each member shall have a qualified factory certificate.

translations.source: d所有部件均附有材料合格证或材料复验报告。
translations.target: d All members shall be accompanied by material certificates of conformity or material re-test reports.
